title: Corruption Icon
body:
I'm not sure if this is where I can ask about this, but since my favorite rotating game mode is making the rounds again (Dark Star: Singularity), I realized: I don't think I ever got my Corruption Icon. I know for a fact I won a game with two friends during the initial release of the game mode; I honestly don't think I once played it alone. I love this game mode and would hate to miss out on one of the awesome icons. Heck, I played it enough to get two pentakills (proof provided upon request :D). Just want to check and make sure I didn't get skipped over when you guys were going through accounts (side note: hella relieved for you guys that missions make that a shit load easier).

Thanks,
A Concerned Support Main

replies.body: It's there! AHH you're the best!! Is there somewhere I can give feedback? 11/10 would recommend Rito support <3

Hah no worries! Being able to help how I can is thanks enough for me!! ^_^

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Sometimes it can take awhile for those icons to be delivered. It's a little strange that yours would be taking so long, but do me a favor and check for it really quickly! It should be tucked away in your list of icons now!
You guys are pathologically nice, I always end up just wanting to be your friend lol *~*
